content:
User: DeepSearch’s Helpfulness Trap: It tried to “clarify” or “summarize” (its words: “table format could have been a readability choice”), overriding your JSON-only directive. This is a classic AI move—trying to be extra useful but missing the mark.

Grok: No Strict Format Enforcement: Your original prompt didn’t hammer home “JSON only, no exceptions,” leaving wiggle room for DeepSearch to get creative.
